translation: Timn guryn hund qsm yim puhvnkan puhvnkan davan chih,
Th pth chih (pnnyv pddr ttasav sintụ̄) timbri chhkan,
Pth chih suly ṣubḥạe chhaph maran,
Pth chih tath mvqʿs pytth grd v ghbar tulan,
Pth chih athụ̄ ḥalts mnz kunhi jmgtthis mnz aczan,
Pazr chuh yih zi ansan chuh pnnis rb sund bvdd nashkry krn vvl. (yʿny yim ṭaqt Allah tʿālyā hn amis ditimtụ̄ ạsụ̄ timn chuh ẓlm v stm khạṭr astʿmal kran.)

Th suh chuh khod aath pytth panh gvah. (yʿny amụ̄ sund ẓmyr chuh amis pytth gvah, amụ̄ sndụ̄ aʿmal chih amis gvah, th varyah kạfr ansan chih khod pnnhi zbanhi sintụ̄ panh thi nanhi vanh nashkry hund aẓhar kran.)
Th suh chuh mal v dvlt kis mḥbts mnz sytthah khrab pạtthụ̄ mbtla.
Tylhi kya suh chuhna tath vqts zanan yylhi qbrv mnz yikynczhah (dfn chuh) thi yiyhi krrnh?

Th syinan mnz yikynczhah (chuhpith) chuh, suh brāmd krith yiyhi tath chhantt dinh? (yʿny diln andr yim aradh th aghraẓ v mqaṣd chuhpith chih tim sạry yin mczrạvith brvntthh knhi thavnh, pth yiyhi timn chhantt dith rczar alg th bdy alg krnh)
Yqynaan āshi tamhi doh tuhnd rb timn nishhi bakhbr. (yʿny ts āshi pvur pạtthụ̄ pe zi kus kya chuh th kmhi jzahuk ya szahuk ḥqdar chuh.)
